name: Clockwork Spirits

branding_data.short_description: A side-scrolling action platformer where players control a mechanical knight battling through haunted lands.
branding_data.detailed_description: Clockwork Spirits is a thrilling side-scrolling action platformer inspired by the classic 'Ghouls 'n Ghosts'. Set in a world where machinery and the supernatural collide, players take on the role of a mechanical knight, Sir Gearheart. Tasked with rescuing the enchanted kingdom from the clutches of a ghostly menace, players must navigate through eerie landscapes filled with mechanical and spectral enemies. The game introduces a unique twist by integrating mechanical elements into the protagonist's abilities, allowing players to harness idiosyncratic clockwork mechanisms to overcome challenges and defeat bosses. With a steampunk aesthetic and fast-paced gameplay, Clockwork Spirits offers a fresh take on the classic formula, emphasizing strategic use of the knight's mechanical enhancements to conquer the haunted realms.
